member.name: T:Gios.Pdf.PdfCellRange
member.summary: This class represent a range of Cell. Each method called will be applied to each Cell.

member.summary: Sets this Content Format to each Cell of the CellRange.

member.summary: sets this Content to each Cell of the CellRange.

member.summary: sets this Color as background to each Cell of the CellRange

member.summary: sets those two colors as alternating backgrounds to each Row of the CellRange

member.name: M:Gios.Pdf.PdfCellRange.SetForegroundColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: sets this Color as Foreground Color to each Cell of the CellRange.

member.summary: sets Foreground and Background Colors of each Cell of the CellRange.

member.summary: sets this Foreground and Background Colors to each Cell of the CellRange.

member.name: M:Gios.Pdf.PdfCellRange.SetContentAlignment(System.Drawing.ContentAlignment)
member.summary: sets this content alignment to each Cell of the CellRange.

member.name: M:Gios.Pdf.PdfCellRange.SetFont(System.Drawing.Font)
member.summary: sets this font to each Cell of the CellRange.

member.name: M:Gios.Pdf.PdfCellRange.SetTransparent
member.summary: sets transparent each Cell of the CellRange.

member.name: M:Gios.Pdf.PdfCellRange.SetCellPadding(System.Double)
member.summary: sets this CellPadding to each Cell of the CellRange.

member.name: M:Gios.Pdf.PdfCellRange.MergeCells
member.summary: The CellRange will be collapsed into a single Cell (with the lowest row and column index) This method will automatically sets the colspan and rowspan of the first Cell of the Range.

member.summary: The entire collection of Cells.
